name: Do Your Thng: Earn With Every Post
description: Do Your Thng brings collaboration between brands and creators in one place so you can focus on whats important  doing what you love. Whether you are an average social media user or an influencer with a massive following, the DYT App is for you. With the app, you get to promote what you believe in and earn while youre at it. Plus, its free.  Use DYT to:   Find brands you want to collaborate with, easily and quickly.  Promote products, services, beliefs to your followers.  Get paid for Instagram posts (and Twitter, and Facebook).  Connect with a community of creators.  Why join DYT?  DYT makes it easy for you to discover brands and causes you love to talk about. No matter how small or big your following, DYT makes your voice count. Rumours say we make the life of online creators simpler! But we can guarantee that DYT makes collaborating with brands faster and more transparent and oh so much fun!  How does DYT work?   Download the app.   Create an account.  Link it to your Instagram, Twitter, or Facebook (your choice).   Pick the brand campaign you love.  Share it with your friends and family.  For every post, you get credits (read: money in the account).  Its that simple. We hope youll give DYT a try. Got questions? Drop a line at howdy@dyt.onl For more ideas on how to use DYT, visit: https://doyourthng.com/
